# Discrete

```{r}
ice_format <- read.csv("../Processed_data/FCR_ice.csv")

months_format <- data.frame(Month = c("Spring", "Summer", "Fall", "Winter"),
                            yday = c(yday("2021-03-01"),
                                     yday("2021-06-01"),
                                     yday("2021-09-01"),
                                     yday("2021-12-01")))

solstice_format <- data.frame(Month = c("Equinox", "Solstice", "Equinox", "Solstice"),
                              yday = c(yday("2021-03-20"),
                                       yday("2021-06-20"),
                                       yday("2021-09-22"),
                                       yday("2021-12-21")))
discrete <- ice_format %>%
  ggplot()+
  scale_linetype_manual(values = c(1, 2), breaks = c("Ice on", "Ice off")) +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = yday, lty = Event), color = "lightblue") +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = yday, color = "Month"), data = months_format) +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = yday, color = "Solstice/equinox"), data = solstice_format) +
  xlim(0, 365)+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("black", "goldenrod")) +
  theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) + 
  ggtitle("Discrete seasonal clasifications") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid = element_blank()) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(ncol=1),
         lty = guide_legend(ncol=1))

discrete
```

# Continuous
Add schmidt stability

```{r}
catwalk_format <- read.csv("../Processed_data/FCR_catwalk.csv")
met_format <- read.csv("../Processed_data/FCR_met.csv")

continuous <- catwalk_format  %>%
  filter(!is.na(Value)) %>%
  full_join(met_format) %>%
  filter(!Variable == "Rain_Total_mm") %>%
  mutate(Variable = factor(Variable, 
                           levels = c("EXOTemp_C_1", 
                                      "AirTemp_C_Average", 
                                      "EXOChla_ugL_1", 
                                      "ShortwaveRadiationDown_Average_W_m2"),
                           labels = c("Surface temperature (ºC)", 
                                      "Air temperature (ºC)",
                                      "Surface chlorophyll-a (µg/L)",
                                      "Shortwave (W/m2)"))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = yday, y = Value, color = Variable)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("purple","pink", "#26c9a3", "goldenrod")) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_smooth(se = F, linewidth = 1.5) +
  theme_bw() + 
  ggtitle("Seasonally-varying parameters") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        axis.title.x = element_blank()) +
  guides(color=guide_legend(ncol=1))

continuous
```
